thread.title: UBS Unit to Pay $34 Million in Settlements Over Puerto Rico Bond Funds
thread.title_full: UBS Unit to Pay $34 Million in Settlements Over Puerto Rico Bond Funds - WSJ

author: Mike Cherney
title: UBS Unit to Pay $34 Million in Settlements Over Puerto Rico Bond Funds
text:
A unit of UBS Group AG agreed to pay roughly $34 million in settlements with U.S. regulators on Tuesday regarding the sale of Puerto Rico bond funds that plummeted in value in recent years.
The settlements come as Puerto Rico’s financial crisis is drawing increased scrutiny from U.S. lawmakers and regulators. A measure to establish more robust federal oversight over Puerto Rico’s mutual-fund industry was introduced in Congress last...
